entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain in the evening. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
